TopicTitle: War Thunder: What should be added?

Articles.Content: Hey, so I was wondering, what do you think should be added to War Thunder. For me, I think they should add the TOG II into the game!

All the things!

Watercraft... Aren't they working on that?
Skyraider! and italian tech tree!... and Leopard 1 Prototype (this or the leopard 1 was supposed to be added whit the T-10 Too)

Non-Utter Sh*t Matchmaking! As well as re-adding the April Fool's Walker Event (seriously, that was the best thing to be implemented in a long time)! Make SB not an event! Make the game less grindy so i don't have to spend 3 months to get a single darn tank!

In the russian forums they made a poll to extend the ST-1 event until friday... sadly Gaijin did not extend it... i just had the opportunity of using the german ST-1

Also we need the toilet bomb for that A1 Skyraider >:0!... and the P-47B!... And the glorious H8K!

In the russian forums they made a poll to extend the ST-1 event until friday... sadly Gaijin did not extend it... i just had the opportunity of using the german ST-1

Also we need the toilet bomb for that A1 Skyraider >:0!... and the P-47B!... And the glorious H8K!

Yeah, the thing that is annoying about that poll was that the Russian CM said if it got 1K "Yes" votes the event would stay until the weekend, and the poll got over 1,300 "yes" votes.
